div.p: ‘… to Zenon greeting. I have appended for you a copy of the letter from Cephalon. Farewell. Year 36, Choiach … ‘Cephalon to Zenon greeting. I have received from Spa … for hoeing and cutting and dressing the trees thirty drachmae. Farewell. Year 36, Choiach …
(Addressed) to Zenon. (Docketed) Year 36, Choiach 20. Copy of a letter of Cephalon.’
